strapiPost.title: Commercial Real Estate in NWA Remains Strong
strapiPost.content:
The region's commercial real estate market remains robust amid a flat vacancy rate in 2020, according to Arvest Bank's most recent Skyline Report.

  • The numbers: The report which summarized commercial real estate in NWA for the second half of 2020 found that the overall vacancy rate was unchanged at 10.8% in 2020, but rose 10% in the second half of 2019.
  • Quote: "Commercial real estate in Northwest Arkansas has, to date, been able to remain strong throughout the last year,‚Äù said Kelly Carlson, senior VP with Arvest Bank Benton County.

Get your real estate fix HERE.
